title: Low vs High Competition Keywords For Low-Content Publishing

tactics.name: search_volume_competition_balance
tactics.description: Prioritize keywords with high monthly search volume and low search results by analyzing their relationship
steps: Use Publisher Rocket to check monthly search volume and Amazon search results
Identify keywords with at least 1,000 searches/month and 2,000+ results
Select 1-2 main keywords meeting these criteria for your title/keywords
source_quotes: it's not enough to have a high search volume if you've got a keyword with the search volume of 20,000 searches per month but there are also just as many results

tactics.name: Keyword Competitive Score Analysis
tactics.description: Evaluate keywords using Publisher Rocket's competitive score metric to prioritize low-competition options.
caveats: Avoid keywords with >40 competitive score for fiction/nonfiction
source_quotes: competitive score of a hundred I'm not going to go anywhere near that
probably one of the best ones out of this entire list

heuristics.name: competitor_count_filter
heuristics.condition: If competitor count exceeds 5,000, avoid keyword
source_quotes: 34,000 competitors... that is not looking good

heuristics.name: Competitive Score Threshold
heuristics.condition: If competitive score is below 65, prioritize for low-content publishing
source_quotes: I'd really like the competitive score to probably be around 60 or 65

claims.statement: Finding keywords with both high search volume and low competition is extremely difficult
source_quotes: this is actually really really difficult

claims.statement: Fiction/nonfiction books require stricter competitive score thresholds (<40) due to higher content creation risk
source_quotes: the person who created publisher rocket he recommends not going above a competitive score of 40

niche_patterns.description: Target specific audience segments with unique constraints
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Creates niche markets with lower competition
source_quotes: how big the competition is in terms of how many reviews they have

niche_patterns.description: Combine broad interests with specific low-content solutions
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Balances search volume with manageable competition
source_quotes: we've got close to a thousand searches per month
